mapper.select:
SELECT age, cst_GENDER cGender, COUNT(rsv_GENDER) countGender , rsv_GENDER rsvGender FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((2016-TO_CHAR(c.cst_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY'))/10) AS age , rsv_GENDER , c.cst_GENDER FROM RESERVATION r, CUSTOMER c where r.CST_EMAIL = c.CST_EMAIL AND 2016 - TO_CHAR(c.cst_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY') >=10 )
group by age, cst_GENDER, rsv_GENDER ORDER BY age
